oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Shiro: A Japanese Rock Musical
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Food; Musicals;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color card (black on white) announcing Shiro: A Japanese Rock Musical and Oriental Food Fest at the Tennessee Performing Arts Center (TPAC) on January 29. This is probably a proof for a metal photoplate. A handwritten note at the bottom of the card says, "1 ea line wood base same size 1 ea line wood base 5 1/2 inches wide," presumably in reference to the size of the metal photoplate.
